tools.name: trustbot_get_state
tools.description: Get the current TrustBot world state including all agents, tasks, and blackboard entries

tools.name: trustbot_list_agents
tools.description: List all agents in the TrustBot system with optional filtering by status, trust score, or type

tools.name: trustbot_get_agent
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific agent including trust tier and permissions

tools.name: trustbot_create_task
tools.description: Create a new task for agents to work on (research, analysis, validation, execution, monitoring, strategy)

tools.name: trustbot_list_tasks
tools.description: List tasks with optional filtering by status or assignee

tools.name: trustbot_delegate_task
tools.description: Delegate a task from one agent to another (requires VERIFIED+ tier, max 2 delegations per task)

tools.name: trustbot_spawn_agent
tools.description: Spawn a new agent (requires CERTIFIED+ parent agent)

tools.name: trustbot_send_message
tools.description: Send a message between agents or post to the blackboard

tools.name: trustbot_get_metrics
tools.description: Get system metrics including trust distribution and task statistics

tools.name: trustbot_run_tick
tools.description: Manually trigger a tick cycle to process pending tasks
